textBeforeTable: The table below looks at the demand and provides a guide to the average salaries quoted in IT jobs citing Database Analyst within the UK over the 3 months to 31 July 2015. The 'Rank Change' column provides an indication of the change in demand within each location based on the same 3 month period last year. Database Analyst Top 30 Job Locations This chart provides a salary histogram for IT jobs citing Database Analyst over the 3 months to 31 July 2015 within the UK. Database Analyst Salary Histogram This chart provides the 3-month moving average for salaries quoted in permanent IT jobs citing Database Analyst within the UK. Database Analyst Salary Trend This chart provides the 3-month moving total of permanent IT jobs citing Database Analyst in the job title within the UK as a proportion of the total demand within the Job Titles category. Database Analyst Jobs Demand Trend +3.89%
textAfterTable: Database Analyst Top 30 Related IT Skills For the 6 months to 31 July 2015, IT jobs within the UK that cited Database Analyst in their job title mentioned the following IT skills in order of popularity. The figures indicate the number of jobs and their proportion against the total number of IT job ads sampled with Database Analyst in their job title. 1 133 (71.12%) SQL 2 115 (61.50%) SQL Server 3 62 (33.16%) Finance 4 57 (30.48%) MS Excel 5 51 (27.27%) SQL Server Reporting Services 6 50 (26.74%) Microsoft 7 48 (25.67%) Analytical Skills 8 45 (24.06%) Oracle 9 44 (23.53%) SQL Server Integration Services 10 40 (21.39%) Degree 11 39 (20.86%) Relational Database 12 31 (16.58%)
